refnamediv.refpurpose: Ping la connexion au serveur et reconnecte si elle n'existe plus

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Style orienté objet :
boolmysqli::ping
Style procédural :
boolmysqli_ping mysqlilink
Checks whether the connection to the server is working. If it has gone down, and global option mysqli.reconnect is enabled an automatic reconnection is attempted.
This function can be used by clients that remain idle for a long while, to check whether the server has closed the connection and reconnect if necessary.
